medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began suddenly yesterday, characterized by epigastric pain radiating to the back, with multiple episodes of vomiting and loose stools. No relief was obtained from peptobismol. The patient reported chills and subjective fever at home.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hypercholesterolemia, history of sigmoid polyp, type II diabetes mellitus, history of proteinuria, history of back pain, status post hysterectomy, recent left knee pain.
medical_history.social_history: Denies alcohol consumption and smoking. No recent travel outside the area.
